description: First of two elementary courses that helps students with no prior background to develop basic
Mandarin skills, such as pronunciation, pinyin, grammar, and handwriting along with knowledge of
Chinese culture and society.  Students should achieve the Novice Mid level on the ACTFL
proficiency scale and identify about 150 characters in areas of daily life and immediate needs
upon completion of this course.  Students attend three classes and one laboratory weekly.. Offered
